title: Prez Mahama Is Getting 55% Votes In Western Region In 2016 Elections - Kofi Adams
text: National Organizer of the ruling National Democratic Congress ( NDC ), Kofi Adams , has emphatically stated that President Mahama is winning more votes in the Western Region due to well established developmental projects in the region. He
